entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
